S06n629:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kimāyuṣman subhūte tūṣṇīṃbhāvenātināmayasi ?
S06n629:2: kiṃ na pratibhāti te prajñāpāramitāmārabhya ayaṃ śāstā svayaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ,
S06n629:3: iyaṃ ca parṣad bhājanībhūtā gambhīrāyā dharmadeśanāyāḥ ?
S06n629:6: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramevamāha-nāhaṃ tamāyuṣman dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaṃ me ārabhya pratibhāyāt-na cāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06n629:11: evaṃ samanupaśyan nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yacca pratibhāyāt,
S06n629:21: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā śakyodāhārtuṃ vā,
S06n629:26: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā |
S06n629:27: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā atītalakṣaṇā vā śakyā nirdeṣṭum,
S06n629:29: alakṣaṇā avyavahārā eṣā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā |
S06n629:32: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra yadrūpasya atītalakṣaṇaṃ vā anāgatalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
S06n629:34: nāpi yadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmatītalakṣaṇaṃ vā anāgatalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇaṃ vā sā prajñāpāramitā |
S06n629:35: yacca āyuṣman śāradvatīputra atītānāgatapratyutpannarūpalakṣaṇasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06n629:37: yā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06n629:39: yā ca āyuṣman śāradvatīputra atītānāgatapratyutpannasya rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānalakṣaṇasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06n629:40: sā na śakyā prajñapayituṃ vā udāhartuṃ vā abhilapituṃ vā vākkarmaṇā vā visarjayitum |
S06n629:43: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nirdeśalakṣaṇena pratyupasthitā,
S06n629:71: nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yena dharmeṇa prajñāpāramitā nirdiśyeta |
S06n629:72: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanamupaiti vā utpaśyati vā |
S06n629:73: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpasya nidarśanamupaiti,
S06n629:79: yāpi sā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñā lokottarā nirvedhagāminī,
S06n629:81: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo nidarśanaṃ nopaiti kasyaciddharmasya,
S06n629:83: api tu khalu āyuṣman śāradvatīputra ya evaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmanayaṃ prajānanti,
S06n629:85: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06n629:87: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06n629:93: na saṃkleśasya na vyavadānasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06n629:122: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya jñānena vā ajñānena vā saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā |
S06n629:123: nāpyanutpādajñānasya vā kṣayajñānasya vā nirodhajñānasya vā saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā |
S06n629:124: nāpi nirvāṇasya saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā |
S06n629:125: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra na kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena vā pratyupasthitā nidarśanena vā,
S06n629:127: api tu khalu āyuṣman śāradvatīputra ya evaṃ nirdeśamavabudhyate- na prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthiteti,
S06n629:130: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya yogāya vā viyogāya vā pratyupasthitā |
S06n629:132: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:133: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:135: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:136: na pṛthivīdhātuṃ nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:137: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:138: na dānaṃ na mātsaryaṃ na śīlaṃ na dauḥśīlyaṃ na kṣāntiṃ na vyāpādaṃ na vīryaṃ na kausīdyaṃ na dhyānaṃ na vikṣepaṃ na prajñāṃ na dauṣprajñyaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:139: na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇāni na ṛddhipādāpramāṇāni nendriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñāḥ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:140: na mārgaṃ na mārgaphalaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na duḥkhasamudayaṃ na nirodhaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:141: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na bodhisattvabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:142: na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na bodhisattvadharmān na buddhadharmān saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:144: nāsaṅgatānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ na nirvāṇaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati |
S06n629:145: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo na kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06n629:147: idamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyannahamevaṃ vadāmi-nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo me dharmaḥ pratibhāyāt,
